courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: PS 240 or PS 241, six hours of Political Science credit, or consent of instructor.
description: Examines the origin and development of Latin American political institutions. Prerequisite: PS 240 or PS 241, six hours of Political Science credit, or consent of instructor.
label: Gov & Pol of Latin America
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Political Science major(s). Not intended for students with Freshman class standing.
